scripts.build:happ: cd ../dnas/lobby && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir/dna && hc app pack workdir/happ && rm -rf ~/tmp && mkdir ~/tmp && hc s clean
scripts.start:holochain: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=$HC_PORT --app-id=$APP_ID network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.start:hc-prxy: cd .. && RUST_LOG=info hc sandbox generate workdir-fixed/happ/ -r=8888 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://0B0aIe8BtorZ2mY1TvxpZsyNgZ72yhqx9-WIeqUJN2Y/kitsune-quic/h/52.194.238.234/p/33548/--
scripts.demo: concurrently "HC_PORT=8888 APP_ID=kizuna npm run start:holochain" "HC_PORT=8889 APP_ID=kizuna npm run start:holochain" "HC_PORT=8899 APP_ID=kizuna npm run start:holochain" "ENV=HCDEV DNA_INTERFACE=ws://localhost:8888 UI_PORT=8100 npm run start:ui" "ENV=HCDEV DNA_INTERFACE=ws://localhost:8889 UI_PORT=8200 npm run start:ui" "ENV=HCDEV DNA_INTERFACE=ws://localhost:8899 UI_PORT=8300 npm run start:ui"
scripts.demo-rmt-prxy: concurrently "npm run start:hc-prxy" "ENV=HCDEV DNA_INTERFACE=ws://localhost:8888 UI_PORT=8100 npm run start:ui"
scripts.start-holo-alice: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-alice" "ADMIN_PORT=9000 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8888 npm run start:holochain"  "ENV=HCC CHAPERONE_PORT=24273 npm run start:ui"
scripts.start-holo-bob: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-bob" "ADMIN_PORT=9001 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8889 npm run start:holochain"  "ENV=HCC CHAPERONE_PORT=24274 npm run start:ui"
scripts.start-holo-charlie: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-charlie" "ADMIN_PORT=9002 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8890 npm run start:holochain"  "ENV=HCC CHAPERONE_PORT=24275 npm run start:ui"
scripts.ios: npx cap sync ios && npx cap copy ios && npx cap open ios
